page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN CHEADLE HULME.
page.content: The main places of employment are around Station Road.It is mostly offices and{no}manfacturing.The offices have different varieties of employment.There are also some solicitors and an architect.We have written to some companies and they sent us some useful information back. Here are two replies: {Humpreys and Glasgow.}We employ 70 people in this area.These people are mainly design engineers,who calculate draw and specify items of equipment. We help run and control all the plants we build. {General and Municipal Boiler Makers {Union.}We look after the interests of our union members,95 000 in the North West.We also employ 50 people.There are branches based throughout the North West.
